dcterms:description: The EMPIAR-10499 dataset comprises 65 tilt-series of native M. pneumoniae cells with annotated ribosomes, used for evaluating particle picking performance.

dcterms:description: EMAN2 is an extensible image processing suite for electron microscopy, utilized for processing images in the context of cryo-electron tomography.

dcterms:description: crYOLO is a fast and accurate fully automated particle picker for cryo-electron microscopy, facilitating the detection of particles in cryo-EM images.
dcterms:title: crYOLO

dcterms:description: The dataset by Huang et al. focuses on accurate detection of proteins in cryo-electron tomograms from sparse labels, contributing to the field of protein localization.
